BIDS format: Keyword 'sub-' followed by one of the original subject IDs without special characters or symbols

Field: Type of subj in PrevDemAls dataset
BIDS format: A or R (A = patients, R = relatives)

Field: Site in which the patient was studied

BIDS format: AD=Alzheimer's disease - bvFTD=behavioral variant Fronto Temporal Dementia

Field: Score of mmse test at the baseline
Indicate if the genotype is mutated or not
Average age onset disease in all the family memeber
